data.name: Journey of a Hero
data.description:
Jeanne generates experience for completing tasks such as gathering resources, constructing buildings, capturing Sacred Sites, and participating in combat. Jeanne also gains a small trickle of experience over time.
After earning sufficient experience Jeanne can level up, becoming more powerful and gaining access to unique abilities.
